alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 1:08AM EST until January 03 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING FOR LAKE MOULTRIE... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory, south winds 10 to 15 knots. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Inland Berkeley County. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, until 3 AM EST early this morning. For the Wind Advisory, until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
